bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to Louisa Van Velsor Whitman, [before 23 May 1873]
bibl.orgName: The Trent Collection of Whitmaniana, Duke University Rare Book, Manuscript, and Special Collections Library

revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

body.p: Mother, I will write only a short letter this time, as I have a good deal of work to do to-day in the office. Every thing goes on with me just the same as usual—I hope you are feeling well, dear mother, & the rest too.
